No monthly subscriptions, no catch. Just a one-off fee and it's yours. With no time-consuming or delinquent application updates required to maintain correct information, Duty Pro is supremely powerful.

Duty Pro is revolutionising the way British police officers maintain their status as the world's best. It provides you with a formidable and highly effective tool to look up and reference criminal and traffic offences and procedures during the course of your investigations.

With the option of two outstanding display modes, you can decide how you'd like Duty Pro to present the information to you.

In ‘Simple’ mode, Duty Pro will show you everything you need to know about the offence, including offence wording, prosecution time limits, charging codes and maximum sentences. All designed in a clear and easy to navigate interface. 

In the exceptional ‘Guidethrough’ mode, not only will it display everything you will see in ‘Simple’ mode, it is smartly and dynamically written to walk you through exactly what steps you should be taking both legally and procedurally. Broken down into easily-identifiable stages of the investigative process, Duty Pro will assist you through the initial account right through to court procedures.

summary.label:
Sometimes during the repair of the car, the battery is disconnected. After battery reconnected the radio is protected by a four digit code.
If you don't remember radio code or lost it, you can recover it quickly and easily with this app using serial number.
Note: serial number is located on the rear side of your radio. It must be starting with "V".

To find the serial number:
- Turn the radio on and hold at the same time the button 1 and 6 (In some cases 2 and 6; sometimes it is necessary to remove the radio)
- See the unit serial. The serial consists of "V" letter and 6 digits. For example: V033125, V719477, V003538
- Input serial to this app

How to input radio code ?
･ Press 1 Button repeatedly for 1st digit to be displayed
･ Press 2 Button repeatedly for 2nd digit to be displayed
･ Press 3 Button repeatedly for 3rd digit to be displayed
･ Press 4 Button repeatedly for 4th digit to be displayed
･ Press and HOLD preset button 5 to store your code (10 seconds)

Please support us with your reviews in AppStore, it's very important for new users! Thank you!

If you experience difficulties with the app, please contact us.
support@kcandr.ru

3) We Have The Best Stars. Precise, modern and deep. We’ve updated our star catalog to use the latest and greatest, UCAC5 star catalog. If 25 million stars down to 15th magnitude isn’t enough for you, an easy in-app purchase gets you down to 16.5 magnitude and a whopping 100 million stars!

9) Tilt It. Every old astronomy app these days lets your tilt and pan your device to show different parts of the sky, but who else lets you control your telescope that way!? “Tilt to slew” is an optional mode allowing you to keep your eye in the eyepiece, and, using the accelerometers in your device, gently translate the movements of your hands into smooth telescope motion.

This app is for Vets, vet technicians and veterinary students worldwide.

Dog and cat medicine is taught at all veterinary schools, however education in exotic animal medicine is greatly lacking.  This contrasts with the frequency at which rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters, tortoises and other reptiles and birds are presented at the veterinary surgery.

Vets are left with no specific training on dealing with these species, and although data is available in books, it usually has to be sourced and may be difficult to obtain if the practice does not have the relevant texts.

Veterinary Care of Exotic Pets is designed to provide biological data on the commonly presented exotic species and includes:

Biological data on commonly presented exotic species, providing answers to common enquiries (e.g. how long is a rabbit pregnant for?  When does a guinea-pig become reproductively active?  What is the normal temperature of a chinchilla?) 
A comprehensive list of common ailments
A list of commonly used drugs and their doses
Gallery of examples of some common conditions and radiographic data
Video clips of blood sampling each species

All this information combines into an app which will allow the vet to easily access some basic information, know which diseases are common in that species, how to treat them and how to work cases up by blood sampling.

This app will prove to be an invaluable mobile resource for Vets, Vet Nurses, Veterinary Technicians and Veterinary Students worldwide. The concept of updates means that this App will never go out of date and can be added to as necessary in the future.

First offline code generator for Ford radio 3000, 4000, 4500, 5000, 6000, 6006, 7000 and 9006 assuming they have a serial number starting with "M".

Sometimes during the repair of the car, the battery is disconnected. After battery reconnected the radio is protected by a four digit code.
If you don't remember radio code or lost it, you can recover it quickly and easily with this app using serial number.
Note: serial number is located on the rear side of your radio. It must be starting with "M". Compatible with: 3000, 4000, 4500, 5000, 6000, 6006, 7000 and 9006.

To find the serial number:
- Turn the radio on and hold at the same time the button 2 and 6 (In some cases, it is necessary to remove the radio)
- See the unit serial. The serial consists of "M" letter and 6 or 7 digits. For example: M033125, M719477, M003538
- Input serial to this app

How to input radio code ?
･ Press 1 Button repeatedly for 1st digit to be displayed
･ Press 2 Button repeatedly for 2nd digit to be displayed
･ Press 3 Button repeatedly for 3rd digit to be displayed
･ Press 4 Button repeatedly for 4th digit to be displayed
･ Press and HOLD preset button 5 to store your code (10 seconds)

Please support us with your reviews in AppStore, it's very important for new users! Thank you!

If you experience difficulties with the app, please contact us.
support@kcandr.ru
